meanings.definition: A reproduction of a document or image made by a machine that can produce multiple copies.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out a multicopy of the worksheet to each student.
meanings.sent2: The office printer can create a multicopy of important memos in seconds.
meanings.sent3: The multicopy of the recipe was so clear that even a beginner chef could follow it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a multicopy, spreading joy to everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The multicopy of the map helped the lost hikers find their way back.

meanings.definition: To produce multiple copies of a document or image.
meanings.sent1: She multicopied the report for all the team members to review.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore multicopies textbooks for students to purchase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student multicopied his face on the school's copier.
meanings.sent4: His words multicopy through the room, echoing his message to all.
meanings.sent5: The artist multicopied her painting to share with art enthusiasts.
